code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavigationBar=_ref=>{let{brandName,imageSrcPath,navItems}=_ref;const[selectedIndex,setSelectedIndex]=React.useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleNavigation=(index,path)=>{setSelectedIndex(index);navigate(path);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-expand-md navbar-light bg-light",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{className:"navbar-brand",href:"javascript:void(0)",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageSrcPath,height:"60",className:"d-inline-block align-center me-2",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bolder fs-4",children:brandName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"navbar-toggler",type:"button","data-bs-toggle":"collapse","data-bs-target":"#navbarSupportedContent","aria-controls":"navbarSupportedContent","aria-expanded":"false","aria-label":"Toggle navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-toggler-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collapse navbar-collapse",id:"navbarSupportedContent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"navbar-nav me-auto mb-2 mb-md-1",children:navItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:`nav-item ${selectedIndex===index?'nav-link active':''}`,onClick:()=>handleNavigation(index,item.path),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"javascript:void(0)",children:item.label})},index))})})]})});};export default NavigationBar;
